name: Tower Link
description:
Tower Link

In this tower defense game your towers become more powerful by linking them together.

How to play:

Place new towers by clicking on a free space.

Connect towers by holding the left mouse button down.

Space: Start/Pause

ESC: Restart

M: Mute

Power Ups:

  • Red - extra damage (priorotize highest health)
  • Blue - slow enemies (priorotize not slowed enemies)
  • Green - increase shoot speed

You can connect multiple power ups to the same tower and connect upgraded towers to another tower to share the upgrades.

Art by  Kenney Vleugels (Kenney.nl)

BGM by Chris Murphy
